text: Larry Rivers (May 6, 1949 â€“ April 29, 2023), also known as Gator Rivers, was an American basketball player, coach, business owner, and civil servant. He performed as a dribbler for the Harlem Globetrotters, and served as a coach, from 1973 to 1986. In 2020, he was elected to the Chatham County Commission, in Chatham County, Georgia, and served in the District 2 seat from 2021. He died on April 29, 2023, a week before his 74th birthday. ==References== Category:American basketball players Category:1949 births Category:2023 deaths
title: Larry Rivers (basketball)
